summary: An ordinance relating to and amending Plat 73E & 73W, page 173 & 174, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Portion of Sec. 27-24-4, located on both sides of 42nd Ave. So. south of Myrtle St., from Duplex Residence High Density (RD 5000) Zone to Community Business (BC) Zone. Also includes Lots 1-8 incl., and north 34' of Lot 9, Ulferts Add.
